content.prompt: Which of the following best describes a claim made by the author in the passage?

choices.label: The expansion of African empires contributed to increased global trade.
Trade networks in Asia were highly interconnected before contact with European explorers.
There was an extensive slave trade across the Indian Ocean.
The Spanish Reconquista led to significant European exploration.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and describe a claim or argument in a text-based or non-text-based source.
